title: ANPR Flow Observed schema
description: The data model intended to represent an observation linked to the passing of a vehicle at a certain location and at a given time. This Data Model is based on the [dataModel.Transportation/ItemFlowObserved], extended with ANPR specific properties and links to the observation images.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be AnprFlowObserved

dateReceived.description: Property. Timestamp when the observation has been received by the platform.

observedBy.description: Relationship. The entity or device which has reported this observation

laneId.description: Property. Lane identifier. Lane identification provided by the observer.

areaServed.description: Property. The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

zonesServed.description: Array of zones that are able to receive or read the observations

vehiclePlateNotRead.description: Property. Indicates if a license could not be read

observedVehicle.description: Property. Information about the observed vehicle.

direction.description: Property. Detected direction of the observed vehicle.

speed.description: Property. Detected speed of the observed vehicle.

brand.description: Property. Detected brand of the observed vehicle.

confidence.description: Property. Confidence level of the detection

model.description: Property. Detected brand model of the observed vehicle.

confidence.description: Property. Confidence level of the detection.

color.description: Property. Detected color of the observed vehicle.

confidence.description: Property. Confidence level of the detection.

country.description: Property. Detected country of the observed vehicle.

code.description: Property. Country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

confidence.description: Property. Confidence level of the detection.

licensePlate.description: Property. Detected license plate of the observed vehicle.

confidence.description: Property. Confidence level of the detection.

coordinates.description: Property. Sequence of position points describing this location, expressed in coordinate system

refImages.description: Relationship. Array of multiple objects that refer to images.

url.description: Property. URL referencing to the image

contentType.description: Property. Content type according to IANA Media Types.
